text: ennitt avar addehatte nisedhiccu tallikkalannu. appeal addehatteyum addehatteateappamullavareyum nam kappalil raksappetuttukayum, avare nam (bhumiyil) pingamikalakkukayum ceytu. nam'mute drstantannal nisedhiccutalliyavare nam mukkikkalannu. appeal neakku; takkit nalkappetta a vibhagattinre paryavasanam ennaneyayirunnuvennâ€Œ
